ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: And to spin off another subject... did anyone see that webpage that supposedly broke down the eq exp tables? Url:
ygData.messageBody:
And to spin off another subject... did anyone see that webpage that
supposedly broke down the eq exp tables?

Url:
http://www.geocities.com/orderoftheblackdagger/EQexp2/
:Url

Halfing warriors actually had the best rate - it was like someone had typoed
the table.

-----Original Message-----
From: ug@... [mailto:ug@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 6:14 PM
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?


Jeffrey Sue writes:
> At 06:02 PM 4/27/00 -0400, you wrote:
> >well from the whineplay forum and my own eyes I've seen Iksar wandering
> >around Greater Fay (and running to the guards for help).
> >
> >Also people have mentioned that they have tried almost every city and are
> >even indifferent to merchants.
> >
> >20% exp penalty for Regen, Infravision and good faction across the
board....
> >looking for other negatives
>
> out of curiousity, what is a troll's exp penalty?

20% off baseline.

--
Frugguk, Frivyn, Fromiss: Xegony
